name: Destructabear
description: The Destructabear Game 0.9 : a pre-release of an adventure game, set in the geographically accurate Cascade Mountains and Mt. Rainer terrain.  Explore the vast alpine scenes.  Smash apart log cabins.  Launch a Bison Skull to knock down trees.  Swim in a pristine alpine lake.  Currently under development, this game will evolve with additional characters, quests, and adventures.  Stay tuned for version 1.0.  Enjoy the subtle and relaxing vibes of being immersed in forests, mountains, and nature.
